verses.verse: צַדִּ֤יק <S%H6662><s%> Righteous אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> O יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> [art] thou O LORD כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> would אָרִ֖יב <S%H7378><s%> when I plead אֵלֶ֑יךָ <S%H413><s%> you אַ֤ךְ <S%H389><s%> Indeed מִשְׁפָּטִים֙ <S%H4941><s%> with thee of [thy] judgments אֲדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> with thee yet let me talk אוֹתָ֔ךְ <S%H854><s%> for מַדּ֗וּעַ <S%H4069><s%> Why דֶּ֤רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> Wherefore doth the way רְשָׁעִים֙ <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked צָלֵ֔חָה <S%H6743><s%> prosper שָׁל֖וּ <S%H7951><s%> ? [wherefore] are all they happy כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> in בֹּ֥גְדֵי <S%H899><s%> that deal very בָֽגֶד׃ <S%H898><s%> treacherously

נְטַעְתָּם֙ <S%H5193><s%> Thou hast planted גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> have also שֹׁרָ֔שׁוּ <S%H8327><s%> them yea they have taken root יֵלְכ֖וּ <S%H1980><s%> grow גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> have even עָ֣שׂוּ <S%H6213><s%> yea they bring forth פֶ֑רִי <S%H6529><s%> fruit קָר֤וֹב <S%H7138><s%> thou [art] near אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> you בְּפִיהֶ֔ם <S%H6310><s%> in their mouth וְרָח֖וֹק <S%H7350><s%> and far from מִכִּלְיוֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H3629><s%> their reins

וְאַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> O יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> But thou O LORD יְדַעְתָּ֔נִי <S%H3045><s%> knowest תִּרְאֵ֕נִי <S%H7200><s%> me thou hast seen וּבָחַנְתָּ֥ <S%H974><s%> me and tried לִבִּ֖י <S%H3820><s%> mine heart אִתָּ֑ךְ <S%H854><s%> toward הַתִּקֵם֙ <S%H5423><s%> toward thee pull them out כְּצֹ֣אן <S%H6629><s%> like sheep לְטִבְחָ֔ה <S%H2878><s%> for the slaughter וְהַקְדִּשֵׁ֖ם <S%H6942><s%> and prepare לְי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> them for the day הֲרֵגָֽה׃ <S%H2028><s%> of slaughter ס

עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against מָתַי֙ <S%H4970><s%> How תֶּאֱבַ֣ל <S%H56><s%> mourn הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> How long shall the land וְעֵ֥שֶׂב <S%H6212><s%> and the herbs כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of every הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <S%H7704><s%> of every field יִיבָ֑שׁ <S%H3001><s%> wither מֵרָעַ֣ת <S%H7451><s%> for the wickedness יֹֽשְׁבֵי־ <S%H3427><s%> of them that dwell בָ֗הּ סָפְתָ֤ה <S%H5595><s%> are consumed בְהֵמוֹת֙ <S%H929><s%> therein? the beasts וָע֔וֹף <S%H5775><s%> and the birds כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> Because אָמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> because they said לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> He will not יִרְאֶ֖ה <S%H7200><s%> He shall not see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַחֲרִיתֵֽנוּ׃ <S%H319><s%> our last end

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> If אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with רַגְלִ֥ים ׀ <S%H7273><s%> with the footmen רַ֙צְתָּה֙ <S%H7323><s%> If thou hast run וַיַּלְא֔וּךָ <S%H3811><s%> and they have wearied וְאֵ֥יךְ <S%H349><s%> how תְּתַֽחֲרֶ֖ה <S%H8474><s%> thee then how canst thou contend אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for הַסּוּסִ֑ים <S%H5483><s%> crane וּבְאֶ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> A land שָׁלוֹם֙ <S%H7965><s%> of peace אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you בוֹטֵ֔חַ <S%H982><s%> [wherein] thou trustedst וְאֵ֥יךְ <S%H349><s%> How תַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> [they wearied thee] then how wilt thou do בִּגְא֥וֹן <S%H1347><s%> in the swelling הַיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ <S%H3383><s%> Jordan

כִּ֧י <S%H3588><s%> although גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> even אַחֶ֣יךָ <S%H251><s%> For even thy brethren וּבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> and the house אָבִ֗יךָ <S%H1><s%> of thy father גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> Even הֵ֙מָּה֙ <S%H1992><s%> they בָּ֣גְדוּ <S%H898><s%> even they have dealt treacherously בָ֔ךְ גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> Even הֵ֛מָּה <S%H1992><s%> they קָרְא֥וּ <S%H7121><s%> with thee yea they have called אַחֲרֶ֖יךָ <S%H310><s%> after מָלֵ֑א <S%H4392><s%> a multitude אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תַּאֲמֵ֣ן <S%H539><s%> thee believe בָּ֔ם כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> although יְדַבְּר֥וּ <S%H1696><s%> them not though they speak אֵלֶ֖יךָ <S%H413><s%> about טוֹבֽוֹת׃ <S%H2896><s%> fair words ס

עָזַ֙בְתִּי֙ <S%H5800><s%> I have forsaken אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּיתִ֔י <S%H1004><s%> mine house נָטַ֖שְׁתִּי <S%H5203><s%> I have left אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַחֲלָתִ֑י <S%H5159><s%> mine heritage נָתַ֛תִּי <S%H5414><s%> I have given אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְדִד֥וּת <S%H3033><s%> the dearly beloved נַפְשִׁ֖י <S%H5315><s%> of my soul בְּכַ֥ף <S%H3709><s%> into the hand אֹיְבֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H341><s%> of her enemies

הָיְתָה־ <S%H1961><s%> has become לִּ֥י נַחֲלָתִ֖י <S%H5159><s%> Mine heritage כְּאַרְיֵ֣ה <S%H738><s%> is unto me as a lion בַיָּ֑עַר <S%H3293><s%> in the forest נָתְנָ֥ה <S%H5414><s%> add עָלַ֛י <S%H5921><s%> against בְּקוֹלָ֖הּ <S%H6963><s%> aloud עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> have come שְׂנֵאתִֽיהָ׃ <S%H8130><s%> against me therefore have I hated

הַעַ֨יִט <S%H5861><s%> bird צָב֤וּעַ <S%H6641><s%> [is] unto me [as] a speckled נַחֲלָתִי֙ <S%H5159><s%> Mine heritage לִ֔י הַעַ֖יִט <S%H5861><s%> the birds סָבִ֣יב <S%H5439><s%> round about עָלֶ֑יהָ <S%H5921><s%> against לְכ֗וּ <S%H1980><s%> along אִסְפ֛וּ <S%H622><s%> ye assemble כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all חַיַּ֥ת <S%H2416><s%> all the beasts הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <S%H7704><s%> of the field הֵתָ֥יוּ <S%H857><s%> come לְאָכְלָֽה׃ <S%H402><s%> to devour

רֹעִ֤ים <S%H7462><s%> pastors רַבִּים֙ <S%H7227><s%> Many שִֽׁחֲת֣וּ <S%H7843><s%> have destroyed כַרְמִ֔י <S%H3754><s%> my vineyard בֹּסְס֖וּ <S%H947><s%> under foot אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֶלְקָתִ֑י <S%H2513><s%> my portion נָֽתְנ֛וּ <S%H5414><s%> they have made אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֶלְקַ֥ת <S%H2513><s%> portion חֶמְדָּתִ֖י <S%H2532><s%> my pleasant לְמִדְבַּ֥ר <S%H4057><s%> wilderness שְׁמָמָֽה׃ <S%H8077><s%> a desolate

שָׂמָהּ֙ <S%H7760><s%> They have made לִשְׁמָמָ֔ה <S%H8076><s%> it desolate אָבְלָ֥ה <S%H56><s%> it mourneth עָלַ֖י <S%H5921><s%> before שְׁמֵמָ֑ה <S%H8077><s%> [and being] desolate נָשַׁ֙מָּה֙ <S%H8074><s%> is made desolate כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> the whole הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> unto me the whole land כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> Because אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> no אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> because no man שָׂ֥ם <S%H7760><s%> layeth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> before לֵֽב׃ <S%H3820><s%> [it] to heart עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> before כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> the whole

שְׁפָיִ֣ם <S%H8205><s%> upon all high places בַּמִּדְבָּ֗ר <S%H4057><s%> through the wilderness בָּ֚אוּ <S%H935><s%> are come שֹֽׁדְדִ֔ים <S%H7703><s%> The spoilers כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For חֶ֤רֶב <S%H2719><s%> for the sword לַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֹֽכְלָ֔ה <S%H398><s%> shall devour מִקְצֵה־ <S%H7097><s%> from the [one] end אֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against קְצֵ֣ה <S%H7097><s%> even to the [other] end הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> There שָׁל֖וֹם <S%H7965><s%> shall have peace לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בָּשָֽׂר׃ <S%H1320><s%> no flesh ס

זָרְע֤וּ <S%H2232><s%> They have sown חִטִּים֙ <S%H2406><s%> wheat וְקֹצִ֣ים <S%H6975><s%> thorns קָצָ֔רוּ <S%H7114><s%> but shall reap נֶחְל֖וּ <S%H2470><s%> they have put themselves to pain לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> to no יוֹעִ֑לוּ <S%H3276><s%> [but] shall not profit וּבֹ֙שׁוּ֙ <S%H954><s%> and they shall be ashamed מִתְּבוּאֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H8393><s%> of your revenues מֵחֲר֖וֹן <S%H2740><s%> because of the fierce אַף־ <S%H639><s%> anger יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD ס

כֹּ֣ה ׀ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all שְׁכֵנַי֙ <S%H7934><s%> neighbours הָֽרָעִ֔ים <S%H7451><s%> against all mine evil הַנֹּֽגְעִים֙ <S%H5060><s%> that touch בַּֽנַּחֲלָ֔ה <S%H5159><s%> the inheritance אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which הִנְחַ֥לְתִּי <S%H5157><s%> to inherit אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמִּ֖י <S%H5971><s%> which I have caused my people אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel הִנְנִ֤י <S%H2005><s%> I am about נֹֽתְשָׁם֙ <S%H5428><s%> Behold I will pluck them out מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> concerning אַדְמָתָ֔ם <S%H127><s%> of their land וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> the house יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah אֶתּ֥וֹשׁ <S%H5428><s%> and pluck out מִתּוֹכָֽם׃ <S%H8432><s%> from among

וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> will come אַֽחֲרֵי֙ <S%H310><s%> And it shall come to pass after נָתְשִׁ֣י <S%H5428><s%> that I have plucked them out אוֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> אָשׁ֖וּב <S%H7725><s%> I will return וְרִֽחַמְתִּ֑ים <S%H7355><s%> and have compassion וַהֲשִׁבֹתִ֛ים <S%H7725><s%> on them and will bring them again אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man לְנַחֲלָת֖וֹ <S%H5159><s%> to his heritage וְאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and every man לְאַרְצֽוֹ׃ <S%H776><s%> to his land

וְהָיָ֡ה <S%H1961><s%> Then אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if לָמֹ֣ד <S%H3925><s%> And it shall come to pass if they will diligently יִלְמְדוּ֩ <S%H3925><s%> learn אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דַּֽרְכֵ֨י <S%H1870><s%> the ways עַמִּ֜י <S%H5971><s%> of my people לְהִשָּׁבֵ֤עַ <S%H7650><s%> to swear בִּשְׁמִי֙ <S%H8034><s%> by my name חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> liveth יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> God כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> as they לִמְּדוּ֙ <S%H3925><s%> as they taught אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמִּ֔י <S%H5971><s%> my people לְהִשָּׁבֵ֖עַ <S%H7650><s%> to swear בַּבָּ֑עַל <S%H1168><s%> by Baal וְנִבְנ֖וּ <S%H1129><s%> then shall they be built בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst עַמִּֽי׃ <S%H5971><s%> of my people

וְאִ֖ם <S%H518><s%> if לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> they will not יִשְׁמָ֑עוּ <S%H8085><s%> But if they will not obey וְנָ֨תַשְׁתִּ֜י <S%H5428><s%> I will utterly אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַגּ֥וֹי <S%H1471><s%> that nation הַה֛וּא <S%H1931><s%> he נָת֥וֹשׁ <S%H5428><s%> pluck up וְאַבֵּ֖ד <S%H6><s%> and destroy נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD ס
